heading: I am already registered in @state_name and need to change my information.
body: Report a change to registration information, such as name, address, or political party.

Here's a quick overview of steps

You can use our tool register for the first time or report a change of name, address or political party to your election office.

  • @iconConfirmEligible

    Make sure you meet registration eligibility requirements

    Review the requirements below to begin.

  • @iconCompleteForm

    Take 5-10 minutes to answer a few questions

    You'll be asked to enter your name, address and identification information. If you do not have valid state identification, you may indicate that in the form-filler; your state will assign you a number for registration purposes.

  • @iconCheckmark

    Confirm all information is correct

    Make sure your information is correct and make any necessary edits before confirming. This information will appear on your completed form.

  • @iconSendForm

    Print, sign, and mail to your election office

    Don’t forget these last steps! You will need to print your completed form, sign it, and mail it to your state office. We’ll provide the address; you provide the first-class postage.

heading: I am registering in @state_name for the first time.
body: Register for the first time in this state. We recommend having your driver’s license or non-driver identification number available.
